name: my-app
description: Use the given Dockerfile on the VM. As root, reach the folder where the Dockerfile is stored and run ```docker build -t my-app .``` Once the image is built, run ```docker run -it --rm --name my-app-1 my-app``` You need to add a port forwarding rule on VirtualBox from 127.0.0.1 port 8080 to the VM IP address on port 8080.
